sentences.english: The vegetation in Xi-Ling (West Tomb) region, Bao-Ding Prefecture of Hebei province has been relatively well preserved.
sentences.chinese: 西陵地區是河北保定一帶植被保存較好的地帶。

sentences.english: Facing the Western Qing Tombs, I shoot without invention, and try to turn it into eternity.
sentences.chinese: 面對西陵我“述而不作”，力求將這一切化爲永恆。

sentences.english: Xiling sits about 100 kilometres to the west of Beijing in Yixian.
sentences.chinese: 西陵位於北京市以西100公里處的河北省易縣。

sentences.english: There are Qing Dynasty imperial tombs at Zunhua (East Qing Tombs) and Yixian (West Qing Tombs).
sentences.chinese: 世界文化遺產清東陵和清西陵。
